name: Scintillate
description:
This is one  of my favorite games that I have released. It isn't the best on gameplay, but I am really proud of how this game looks. I am a terrible artist and put too much time into this game  (even though it looks like it was made in 2 hours).  If you can manage to beat this while getting all the collectables, you are awesome! :)
~864G Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Shift or Space to shoot the Scintillation

Press R to restart the level

There are collectibles but your goal is to get off the screen

Good luck!

P.S. please leave feedback on how I can improve this game and my future games.
